Terms of Service

Last updated: January 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using Pulse Academy's services, including our website, courses, and consultations, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. These Terms of Service govern your use of all services provided by Pulse Academy.

2. Services Description

Pulse Academy provides music production education, mixing and mastering consultations, track analysis services, and related educational content. Our services include but are not limited to:

  • Online music production courses and programs
  • One-on-one mixing and mastering consultations
  • Track analysis and feedback sessions
  • Educational content and resources
  • Community access and support

3. User Responsibilities

When using our services, you agree to:

  • Provide accurate and truthful information
  • Respect intellectual property rights
  • Not share course materials or content without permission
  • Maintain confidentiality of any proprietary techniques shared
  • Use services for educational purposes only

4. Payment and Refunds

Payment terms and refund policies:

  • All payments are processed securely through our payment providers
  • Free consultation sessions are provided as described on our website
  • Paid services are non-refundable unless specified otherwise
  • We reserve the right to modify pricing with notice

5. Intellectual Property

All course materials, methods, techniques, and content provided by Pulse Academy are proprietary and protected by intellectual property laws. Users are granted a personal, non-transferable license to use these materials for educational purposes only. Redistribution, sharing, or commercial use of our content is strictly prohibited.

6. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you consent to the collection and use of information as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

7. Limitation of Liability

Pulse Academy provides educational services and cannot guarantee specific outcomes or results. While we strive to provide high-quality education and guidance, individual results may vary. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of our services.

8. Termination

We reserve the right to terminate or suspend access to our services at any time for violations of these terms or for any other reason deemed necessary. Users may also terminate their account at any time by contacting us.

9. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last modified" date. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

10. Contact Information

If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through our website or social media channels.
